response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Research and Design Engineer |
response.summary:
Chemical Engineer with 3 years of invaluable experience in research, innovation and design. Working collaboratively with multidisciplinary engineering teams has been a rewarding part of my journey, as it allowed me to enhance my problem-solving skills and broaden my technical expertise.

My focus on environmental field led me to develop a profound knowledge of wastewater treatment and membrane technologies, enabling me to contribute meaningfully to creating sustainable solutions for industrial challenges. I take pride in my ability to design and develop cutting-edge electrocoagulation devices that align with the latest advancements in the industry.

Proficient in using tools like Autodesk Inventor and AutoCAD Plant 3D, for modeling customized equipments depending on client’s requirements. My commitment to innovation and continuous learning drives me to stay at the forefront of technological advancements within the chemical engineering domain.

I am always open to new opportunities, collaboration, and networking within the industry.
response.skills: Design, research, Investigación y desarrollo (I+D), Microsoft Excel, Diseño de plantas, Autodesk Inventor, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Tratamiento de aguas, AutoCAD Plant 3D, Ingeniería de proyectos, Aspen Plus, Comunicación

profile_positions.description:
•	Performed laboratory experimentation to develop diverse mathematical models for scaling electrocoagulation equipment.
•	Modeled using Autodesk Inventor software to create 3D models of industrial scales electrocoagulation devices, including detailed pieces that played a crucial role on them.
•	Generated documentation for both basic and detailed engineering aspects, including but not limited to Process Flow Diagrams (PFDs), Piping and Instrumentation Diagrams (P&IDs), equipment lists and more.
•	Worked together with the engineer team to carry out the installation and commissioning of wastewater treatment equipments.
•	Systematically gathered and compiled data from the installed equipment to monitor and assess its performance.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Conducted both practical and theoretical research on electrocoagulation technology.
•	Designed laboratory-scale prototypes for electrocoagulation devices using Autodesk Inventor.
•	Performed water sample analysis, evaluating different physiochemical parameters and characteristics.
•	Provided remote assistance to on-site engineers, enabling effective and swift resolution of operational issues in treatment plants.
•	Undertaked site visits to water treatment plants to inspect and evaluate company equipments, and when needed, developed the operation of the different systems.
•Assisted in establishing the integrated management system in line with ISO 9001 and ISO 14001
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Collected water samples from various streams in-plant and conduct chemical analysis on them using laboratory facilities.
•	Created safety data sheets (SDS) for hazardous waste materials based on their chemical composition.
•	Implemented the basis of a project for the reuse of LABSA  waste (Linear Alkyl Benzene Sulphonic Acid) within the company facilities.
•	Establishment of a monitoring procedure for measuring mercury concentration in the subsoil water of the chloralkali processing plant and surrounding of the company.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Organize and lead workshops for students.
Provide additional classes to support students in understanding equations of state and mastering Excel and Aspen Plus.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant Thermodynamics
